REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1568 reute r f BC-KENTUCKY-CENTRAL-TO-D 04-03 0076

TEXT.TITLE: KENTUCKY CENTRAL TO DECLARE STOCK DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Kentucky Central Life INsurance Co said the company said it will declare a 200 pct stock dividend on Monday. Accordingly, it said it filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange COmmission for a proposed offering of three mln shares of its class a non-voting common stock, which reflects the anticipated dividend. Proceeds will be used for general purposes. Reuter
